N

NotEnoughMoneyException - Exception in metro.Exceptions
This exception is for any transaction or action with money where not enough money exists.
NotEnoughMoneyException() - Constructor for exception metro.Exceptions.NotEnoughMoneyException
Creates an exception that says, that there's not enough money for this transaction.
NotEnoughMoneyException(int, int) - Constructor for exception metro.Exceptions.NotEnoughMoneyException
Creates an exception for a bad money transfer with the given values of the current state and the amount of money involved in the transaction.
NotEnoughMoneyException(String) - Constructor for exception metro.Exceptions.NotEnoughMoneyException
Creates an exception for anything where not enough money exists with a custom message.
NotificationArea - Class in metro.GameScreen.MainView.NotificationView
This is a kind of log where game-concerned events pop up and are shown.
NotificationArea() - Constructor for class metro.GameScreen.MainView.NotificationView.NotificationArea
Creates a notification area with no entries.
NotificationServer - Class in metro.GameScreen.MainView.NotificationView
The notification server is just a abstraction layer between a publisher of notifications and a service thats displays, stores, analyses, ... messages.
NotificationServer() - Constructor for class metro.GameScreen.MainView.NotificationView.NotificationServer
 
NotificationSubscriber - Interface in metro.GameScreen.MainView.NotificationView
A subscriber for notifications receives all notifications that are send via the NotificationServer.
NotificationType - Enum in metro.GameScreen.MainView.NotificationView
A notification type defines the kind of notification and the way it's displayed, processed, ...
NotificationType() - Constructor for enum metro.GameScreen.MainView.NotificationView.NotificationType
 
notifyClickOnControl(Object) - Method in class metro.WindowControls.ActionObservable
Notifies all observers about an click event on a control.
notifyClosed(Window) - Method in class metro.WindowControls.ActionObservable
 
notifyGotInput(String) - Method in class metro.WindowControls.ActionObservable
Notifies all observers about changed text of this control.
notifySelectionChanged(String) - Method in class metro.WindowControls.ActionObservable
Notifies all observers about a changed selection.
notifyStateChanged(boolean) - Method in class metro.WindowControls.ActionObservable
Notifies all observers about changes in the state of the observable control.
